title: Live score: Bayer Leverkusen v Roma (UEFA Champions League) - Talents Abroad - Sports
text:
Related UEFA Champions League group stage results & fixtures (3rd matchday) Egypt's Salah scores fourth Serie A goal as Roma beat Empoli 3-1 PHOTO GALLERY: Arsenal beat Manchester United, Real Madrid draw in derby, Roma win in Italy Roma beat Palermo, Inter move top of Serie A Second half: Bayer Leverkusen 2-4 Roma
Scorers: Hernandez 4 (pen), 19/ De Rossi 29, 38, Pjanic 54, Falque 73
Yellow cards: Kramer 37 (Leverkusen)/ Nainggolan 25, De Rossi 35 (AS Roma)
Starting line-ups:
Bayer Leverkusen: Bernd Leno, Giulio Donati, Jonathan Tah, Kyriakos Papadopoulos, Wendell, Omer Toprak, Christoph Kramer (Julian Brandt 66), Karim Bellarabi (Admir Mehmedi 57), Hakan Calhanoglu, Kevin Kampl, Chicharito
AS Roma: Wojciech SzczÄ™sny, Vasilis Torosidis, Kostas Manolas, Antonio Rudiger, Lucas Digne, Miralem Pjanic, Daniele De Rossi, Radja Nainggolan, Alessandro Florenzi, Gervinho, Mohamed Salah (Iago Falque 62)
Venue: BayArena, Leverkusen (GER)
Referee: Viktor Kassai (Hungary)
